en.create_command: node main --create [folderPath]  // To create a new folder structure
en.export_command: node main --export [folderPath]  // To export a folder to .npmjs

es.create_command: node main --create [folderPath]  // Para crear una nueva estructura de carpetas
es.export_command: node main --export [folderPath]  // Para exportar una carpeta a .npmjs
